title: NBFC-MFIs largest provider of micro-credit: Report
description: NBFC-MFIs and scheduled banks dominate micro-credit disbursal in India, with NBFC-MFIs leading. The gross loan portfolio for micro-credit reached Rs 4.33 lakh crore by March 31, 2024.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
